document.full_text: 'catch me if you can,' the new broadway musical by much of the team behind 'hairspray,' is full of elaborate deceptions and corkscrew twists, but not many surprises.
document.title: theater review | 'catch me if you can' : scamming as fast as he can
lines_and_colors: 'catch me if you can,' the new broadway musical by much of the team behind 'hairspray,' is full of elaborate deceptions and corkscrew twists, but not many surprises.
